tasks.title: Website performance issue
tasks.description: Investigate the performance issue on the website and come up with a solution to improve it.

tasks.title: Price not showing correctly in Listing Page
tasks.description: Fix the issue with the incorrect pricing display on the listing page.

tasks.title: Add calendar view to Listing Page
tasks.description: Add a calendar view to the listing page to help users easily navigate and select dates.

tasks.title: Website Accessibility issue
tasks.description: Investigate the accessibility issue on the website and come up with a solution to make it more accessible for all users.

tasks.title: Cannot wishlist a product
tasks.description: Fix the issue with the wishlist functionality, so that users are able to add items to their wishlist.

tasks.title: Add month view to calendar
tasks.description: Add a month view to the calendar, allowing users to easily see a full month worth of dates at once.

tasks.title: Not showing correct day in calendar
tasks.description: Fix the issue with the incorrect day display in the calendar, so that it accurately reflects the selected date.

tasks.title: Add calendar view to Landing page
tasks.description: Add a calendar view to the landing page to help users easily select a date and navigate to the listing page.
